jodd.madvoc.result

Class JsonResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.madvoc.result.JsonResult

  • @RenderWith(value=JsonActionResult.class)
public class JsonResult
extends java.lang.Object
    General JSON result.

    • Constructor Summary

      static JsonResult empty()
      Creates a JSON result with empty body.
      java.lang.String message()
      Returns response message.

      Creates a JSON response from an exception.

      Creates a JSON result with empty body and given status.

      Creates new JSON result of provided JSON string.

      Returns response status.

        public JsonResult(java.lang.String body)

    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static JsonResult of(java.lang.String json)
        Creates new JSON result of provided JSON string.

      • of

        public static JsonResult of(java.lang.Object object)
        Creates JSON result from given object. The object will be serialized to JSON.

      • of

        public static JsonResult of(HttpStatus httpStatus)
        Creates a JSON result with empty body and given status.

      • of

        public static JsonResult of(java.lang.Exception exception)
        Creates a JSON response from an exception. Response body will have information about the exception and response status will be set to 500.

      • empty

        public static JsonResult empty()
        Creates a JSON result with empty body.

      • status

        public JsonResult status(int status)

      • status

        public JsonResult status(HttpStatus httpStatus)

                         java.lang.String message)

      • value

        public java.lang.String value()
        Returns JSON body.

      • status

        public int status()
        Returns response status.

      • message

        public java.lang.String message()
        Returns response message.
